nodes.bodyText: Nit: I think it's usually better to wrap a line at the start of an argument instead of at a method call in an argument, so \nops.current().specsById() instead of ops.current()\n.specsById(). Otherwise, it looks like you may be calling specsById on ManifestReadTask.
Sounds good to me, My preferred is new lines for every arg every time :) But I think this is reasonable too
